channel.title: Question with InsidiaX base
channel.description:
I am hosting a server off of the base InsidiaX
I wanted to know how I could make it so that when I login the server, It shows in the yell that .. [Owner] Cade has logged in.
How would I do this? Thanks :D

item.title: Question with InsidiaX base
item.dc:creator: @Viz_Curse Viz Curse
item.description:
@Viz_Curse wrote:

Thanks sir

Read full topic

item.title: Question with InsidiaX base
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Client.java in the initialize method.

You might have to change the colors and you can add more if you want…

if(playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[Creator] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 2) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[Administrator] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 1) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[Moderator] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }

Read full topic
